page.title: 03VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Our{Village Hall}has 5 events a week. It has{Cubs}on Tuesdays,{Bingo}on Thursdays,{Silver Threads}on Saturdays for the elderly people in the village and there are{jumble sales.}It was built in November 1973 and is on land owned by the parish council. There are two other events held there for young children.{Playschool}meets there most mornings and caters for those children who are not yet five and then they go on to the primary school. Toddlers meet there once a month. {Guides}and{Brownies}also meet there as well as{Weight Lifting}and{Keep Fit} clubs. There used to be a Youth Club but it finished when there were not many people going.
